actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act to provide for the publication of certain information.

summary.text: Provides for the publication in the Federal Register of information regarding the exportation of agricultural commodities under the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act. (Amends 15 U.S.C. 714c(f))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act to provide for the publication of certain information.
